name: Digit Scape
description:
Let's play

Digit Escape is an endless running 3D, with procedural map generation,  evade the obstacles and survive! Just run. The levels are generated automatically by a powerful AI, which will not make it easy for you. Can you overcome it?

Evade Obstacles

Dominate the game

During the game, random obstacles will appear, which will put your reaction skills to the test. Beware death, it's chasing you!

Break your score

Breack your maximum score, challenge your friends and be the best!

If the level score is not enough, collect the lighthouses that will appear in the level, see how many you are able to get

Developed by:

Alex Martinez alias X-Rose 🥀

Install instructions

Play in browser, smash the play button.
